Title: AN ACT MAKING APPROPRIATIONS FOR PUBLIC WORKS.
Data:
[ Commonwealth Act No. 67, October 23, 1936 ]
AN ACT MAKING APPROPRIATIONS FOR PUBLIC WORKS.
Be it enacted by the National Assembly of the Philippines:
Section 1.
